pageProduct.name: AptaGrow Nutrient-Dense Milk Drink From 1+ Years 900g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Information

Food for Special Medical Purpose for use under medical supervision

AptaGrow is a range of nutrient-dense milk drinks.

One glass of AptaGrow contains 1/3 of the recommended dietary intake of key nutrients*, such as iron, zinc and vitamin D.

*Based on the NHMRC nutrient reference values.

AptaGrow milk drink has been designed to support healthy eating habits with no added sugar in all its products.

The protein and nutrient levels in the AptaGrow range have been specifically designed based on the NHMRC reference values, to meet the growing and developmental needs of fussy eaters at different life stages.

Preparation Instructions for AptaGrow 1+ Years

1. Wash hands before preparing drink. Wash and rinse cup, and all utensils thoroughly.

2. Using the scoop enclosed, fill the scoop lightly and level off using the built-in leveller. Add 6 level scoops of powder to 150mL of lukewarm, safe drinking water.

3. Whisk, stir or shake briskly to dissolve the powder. Serve immediately, or for a cold drink, store in the fridge for 1 hour or until chilled. Stir before use. Discard unfinished drinks.

Our Most Advanced Packaging Innovation

New lid for triple product security:

protective sleeve, tear away tab and double interlocking wall.

Optimised scoop placement:

scoop holder on top lid to keep scoop away from powder.

General Information

AptaGrow 1+ YRS is specifically tailored to the needs of fussy eaters:


  • With prebiotics and probiotics
  • Specific level of protein for toddlers
  • Enriched with nutrients for growth
  • 900g tin
  • Made in New Zealand

    • Food for Special Medical Purpose for use under medical supervision.

    AptaGrow by Aptamil is a nutrient-dense drink with carefully selected nutrients, that is age-adapted to support the nutritional needs of children at each key stage of their development - from toddlers through to growing kids.

    • Zinc to support immune system function
    • Protein contributing to the growth and maintenance of lean muscle
    • Enriched with nutrients, including calcium and iron, for normal growth and development in children
    • No artificial colours, flavours or preservatives
    • No added sugar
    • Just one serve a day
    • Designed to be consumed as part of a healthy, varied diet


    Based on the NHMRC Nutrient Reference Values. Key nutrients iron, zinc & vitamin D.

    Food for Special Medical Purpose for use under medical supervision.

    Suitable For: 1+ years (toddlers)

    Product Claims: With Prebiotics & Probiotics. Enriched with nutrients for growth. No added sugar. No artificial flavours, colours, preservatives.

    Size: 900g

    Serving Size: Appriximately 175mL

    Servings Per Pack: Approximately 34

    Warnings

    Not for children with galactosemia. For enteral use only.
    Not suitable as a sole source of nutrition, designed to be consumed in conjunction with a healthy varied diet.

    Food for special medical purposes. Specially formulated for children who cannot meet their nutritional requirements due to a medical condition. AptaGrow is a nutrient-rich milk drink, with 18 vitamins and minerals, as well as prebiotics and probiotics. Use under medical supervision.

    OUR MOST ADVANCED PACKAGING INNOVATION: 1. New lid for triple product security: protective sleeve, tear away tab and double interlocking wall. 2. Optimised scoop placement: scoop holder on top lid to keep scoop away from powder.

    Do not use if foil security seal is damaged or missing.

    Ingredients

    Milk solids, short chain galacto-oligosaccharides (milk), long chain fructo-oligosaccharides, dried omega LCPUFAs (fish oil, sodium caseinate (milk), antioxidant (sodium ascorbate, natural tocopherols, ascorbyl palmitate, dl-alpha-tocopherol), whey protein (milk), emulsifier (soy lecithin)), emulsifier (soy lecithin), Bifidobacterium breve M-16V.

    Minerals: Calcium, phosphorus, magnesium, iron, zinc, iodine.

    Vitamins: Vitamins (A, B1, B2, B3, B6, C, D3, E), folic acid.

    Contains: Contains: cows' milk, fish and soy.

    Allergen Contains: Fish| Milk| Soy

    Allergen Free From: Added Sugar| Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Artificial Preservatives

    Directions

    Feeding Guide -
    Age: 1-3 years,
    Safe drinking water: 150mL,
    Level scoops of powder*: 6,
    Serve size: 175mL,
    Number of serves per day: 1.

    *1 scoop = 4.3g of powder. NOTE: Always add 1 scoop of powder for each 25mL of water. Only one serve per day is recommended. Consult your healthcare professional for advice.

    PREPARATION INSTRUCTIONS

    1. Wash hands before preparing drink. Wash and rinse cup, and all utensils thoroughly.

    2. Using the scoop enclosed, fill the scoop lightly and level off using the built-in leveller.

    3. Add 6 level scoops of powder to 150mL of lukewarm, safe drinking water.

    4. Whisk, stir or shake briskly to dissolve the powder.

    5. Serve immediately, or for a cold drink, store in the fridge for 1 hour or until chilled. Stir before use.

    6. Discard unfinished drinks.

    Prepare as directed, or try adding to your child's favourite drinks or foods. It is safer to use AptaGrow immediately after it is prepared.

    STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

    Store in a cool dry place. Use by the date on container bottom. After opening, keep container airtight and use contents within 6 weeks.

    RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

    Recycle.

    Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
